pages.text: This certificate of filth shows that you have slain $(l:besmirchment:creatures/beelzebub)Beelzebub$()... probably.$(br)It can be signed using a $(l:bewitchment:tools/taglock)Taglock$().$(br)The signed Demonic Deed can in turn be used to tame $(l:bewitchment:creatures/demon)Demons$() to whoever it is bound to.

Tamed $(l:bewitchment:creatures/demon)Demons$() behave much like wolves in that they will help you in combat.$(br)They can be commanded to remain at their position or follow you, and will still offer their trades.$(br)Additionally, they can be fed cake to regenerate health.
